This repository, singhalgoru/lazel-mrugesh, is an Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) Edge Delivery Services project. It contains blocks, styles, and scripts for a website.

Key AEM Edge Delivery Documentation:
- AEM Developer Documentation: https://www.aem.live/developer/
- AEM Blocks Documentation: https://www.aem.live/developer/guides/blocks
- AEM Best Practices: https://www.aem.live/developer/guides/best-practices-for-developers
